慴伏: (しょうふく) - prostrating oneself in fear; kneeling in fear; crouching in fear; prostration
慶び: (よろこび) - joy; delight; rapture; pleasure; gratification; rejoicing; congratulations; felicitations
慶び事: (よろこびごと) - auspicious event; celebration
慶ぶ: (よろこぶ) - to be delighted/to be glad/to be pleased; to congratulate; to gratefully accept
慶兆: (けいちょう) - sign of happiness; good omen
慶安: (けいあん) - agency for employing servants and arranging marriages (Edo period)/mediator/go-between; flattery/flatterer; (慶安 only) Keian era (1648.2.15-1652.9.18)
慶庵: (けいあん) - agency for employing servants and arranging marriages (Edo period)/mediator/go-between; flattery/flatterer; (慶安 only) Keian era (1648.2.15-1652.9.18)
慶良間鹿: (ケラマジカ) - Kerama deer; Ryukyu sika (Cervus nippon keramae)
慶賀使: (けいがし) - Ryukyuan mission to Edo upon the change of the shogun
慶雲: (きょううん) - (けいうん only) auspicious cloud; (慶雲 only) Keiun era (704.5.10-708.1.11)/Kyouun era
慷慨: (こうがい) - righteous indignation; patriotic lamentation; deploration
憂いを帯びた顔: (うれいをおびたかお) - sorrowful look
憂い事: (うれいごと) - bitter experience; misery; distress; grief; sad thoughts
憂い悩む: (うれいなやむ) - to be grievously troubled
憂い顔: (うれいがお) - sad face; sorrowful face; anxious look; sad countenance
憂う: (うりょう) - (v2h-k)    to worry/to be concerned; (v2h-s)    to grieve/to lament/to be anxious/to be distressed
憂うつ: (ゆううつ) - depression; melancholy; dejection; gloom
憂うべき: (うれうべき) - deplorable; alarming; grievous; lamentable
憂え: (うれえ) - lamentation; grief/anguish; anxiety; illness; mourning
憂える: (うれえる) - to grieve; to lament; to be anxious; to be distressed
憂き世: (うきよ) - fleeting life; this transient world; sad world
憂き名: (うきな) - (浮き名, 浮名 only) rumour (of two people having a love affair)/rumor/gossip (about two people being involved)/scandal; bad reputation
憂き目: (うきめ) - bitter experience; misery; distress; grief; sad thoughts; hardship
憂き目を見る: (うきめをみる) - to have a hard time of it; to have a bitter experience
憂き身: (うきみ) - wretched life; life of misery
憂き身をやつす: (うきみをやつす) - to be absorbed in; to devote oneself (to); to give oneself over (to)
憂き身を窶す: (うきみをやつす) - to be absorbed in; to devote oneself (to); to give oneself over (to)
憂さを晴らしに: (うさをはらしに) - for amusement; by way of diversion (distraction from grief)
憂さを晴らす: (うさをはらす) - to forget one's troubles by doing something enjoyable
憂ふ: (うりょう) - (v2h-k)    to worry/to be concerned; (v2h-s)    to grieve/to lament/to be anxious/to be distressed
憂世: (ゆうせい) - worrying about world conditions
憂事: (うれいごと) - bitter experience; misery; distress; grief; sad thoughts
憂国慨世: (ゆうこくがいせい) - (yoji) worrying about the conditions of the country out of sheer patriotism
憂欝: (ゆううつ) - depression; melancholy; dejection; gloom
憂目: (うきめ) - bitter experience; misery; distress; grief; sad thoughts; hardship
憂色: (ゆうしょく) - melancholy air; anxious look; traces of sorrow; gloom
憂身: (うきみ) - wretched life; life of misery
憂鬱質: (ゆううつしつ) - susceptibility to depression
憎々しい: (にくにくしい) - hateful; detestable; loathsome
憎しみあう: (にくしみあう) - to hate each other; to hate mutually
憎しみ合う: (にくしみあう) - to hate each other; to hate mutually
憎たらしい: (にくったらしい) - odious/hateful; (speaking ironically) darling
憎まれっ子世に憚る: (にくまれっこよにはばかる) - Ill weeds grow apace
憎まれ役: (にくまれやく) - thankless role; ungracious part
憎み合う: (にくみあう) - to hate each other; to hate mutually
憎憎しい: (にくにくしい) - hateful; detestable; loathsome
憐れむ: (あわれむ) - to commiserate/to pity/to have mercy on/to sympathize with/to sympathise with; (哀れむ only)  to enjoy the beauty of/to appreciate (e.g. the moon, flowers)
